log

Class Accountant

  • java.lang.Object
    • log.Accountant

  • public class Accountant
extends java.lang.Object
    Accountant keeps log of simulation events incl. trade history and person history Accountant is done singleton pattern

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<LogObject> getAllTrades()
      returns log of all trade events

      return log of all registered events

      returns all logs for desired day

      Get singleton instance
